text: ya tum kahate ho ki ibaraaheem aur isamaeel aur isahaaq aur yaaqoob aur unakee santaan sab ke sab yahoodee ya eesaee the? kaho, "tum adhik jaanate ho ya allaah? aur usase badhakar zaalim kaun hoga, jisake paas allaah kee or se aaee huee koee gavaahee ho, aur vah use chhipae? aur jo kuchh tum kar rahe ho, allaah usase bekhabar nahin hai.
